etg_intro_about:
Welcome to unofficial messaging app
based on Telegram Desktop.
etg_tray_icon_text:
exteraGram is still running here,
you can change this from settings page.
If this icon disappears from tray menu,
you can drag it here from hidden icons.
etg_error_start_minimized_passcoded: You have set a local passcode, so exteraGram Desktop can't be launched minimised; it will ask you to enter your passcode before it can start working.
etg_proxy_unsupported: Your exteraGram Desktop version doesn't support this proxy type or the proxy link is invalid. Please update exteraGram Desktop to the latest version.
etg_theme_no_desktop: Sorry, this theme doesn't include a version for exteraGram Desktop.
etg_passcode_about:
When a local passcode is set, a lock icon appears at the top of your chats list. Click it to lock the app.

Note: if you forget your local passcode, you'll need to relogin in exteraGram Desktop.
etg_message_unsupported: This message is not supported by your version of exteraGram Desktop. Please update to the latest version in Settings, or install it from {link}
etg_bot_share_location_unavailable: Sorry, location sharing is currently unavailable in exteraGram Desktop.
etg_theme_editor_need_unlock: You need to unlock exteraGram to save your theme.
etg_no_mic_permission: exteraGram needs access to your microphone so that you can make calls and record voice messages.
etg_passport_app_out_of_date: Sorry, your Telegram app is out of date and can't handle this request. Please update exteraGram.
etg_export_progress: You can close this window now. Please don't quit exteraGram until the data export is completed.
etg_language_not_ready_about: Unfortunately, this custom language pack ({lang_name}) doesn't contain data for exteraGram Desktop. You can contribute to this language pack using the {link}.
etg_outdated_soon: Otherwise, exteraGram Desktop will stop updating on {date}.
etg_outdated_now: So that exteraGram Desktop can update to newer versions.
etg_settings_sticker_scale_both_about: When enabled, sticker maximum width will be changed along with sticker height.
etg_fonts_about: You will need to restart app to apply and see changes.
etg_net_speed_boost_desc:
Warning: changing this parameter to high values on slow networks can make even worse. Use at your own risk.

You'll need to restart app to save changes.
etg_call_sure: Are you sure you want to call this user?
etg_settings_ffmpeg_multithread_about: When enabled, CPU and RAM consumption is higher, video decodes faster. When disabled, CPU and RAM consumption is lower, video decodes slower. The more CPU cores you have, the more RAM consumption you have when this option is enabled. You can set exact number of threads in the JSON configuration file.
etg_settings_external_video_player_about: When this option is enabled, autoplay is force-disabled and system video player is used to play videos.
etg_stickers_title_copied: Sticker pack name copied to clipboard.
etg_settings_userpic_rounding_desc: You'll need to restart app to save changes.
etg_settings_tray_icon_desc:
If you don't like any of these icons, you can place icon.png in your profile folder, but you'll need to restart app to see it.

Icons below don't require restart.
etg_settings_use_telegram_panel_icon: Ask the system for telegram icon
etg_settings_chat_id_desc:
You can choose desired format here.

Telegram API uses IDs as-is, but Bot API adds minus in the beginning for groups, and -100 for channels and supergroups to fit it in one field.

If you have profile panel opened, re-open it to see changes.
etg_too_many_accounts_warning:
Warning! Using too many accounts at the same time is not recommended due to higher memory comsumption and possible crashes because of it.

You sure you want to add a new account?
etg_settings_forward_chat_on_click_descr: You can hold Ctrl to select multiple chats regardless of this option.
etg_filters_description: Cloud folders are synced between all your Telegram apps, but local folders have more features to offer.
etg_filters_cloud_limit: Sorry, you can't create more cloud folders. You can create local folder instead.
etg_filters_hide_all_chats_toast:
"All Chats" folder is hidden.
You can enable it back in exteraGram Settings.
etg_filters_hide_edit_toast:
Edit button is hidden.
You can enable it back in exteraGram Settings.
etg_forward_force_old_unquoted_desc: Old method copies messages content on client rather than server. Currently it's used only for "Regroup media" grouping mode, since new one doesn't support it. If for some reason unquoted forward doesn't work correctly, try switching this option.
etg_pip_not_supported: Sorry, Picture-in-Picture mode is not supported here.
etg_forward_quiz_unquoted: Sorry, quizzes that are currently open and unvoted on cannot be forwarded unquoted.
etg_experimental_tabbed_panel_by_click_d: Show Emoji / Stickers / GIFs panel only after a click.
etg_experimental_view_profile_context_me: Add "View Profile" to context menu in chats list
etg_experimental_linux_nvidia_opengl: Allow OpenGL on the NVIDIA drivers (Linux)
etg_experimental_linux_nvidia_opengl_des: Qt+OpenGL have problems on Linux with NVIDIA drivers.
etg_settings_view_profile_on_top_about: This option also enables "Add "View Profile"" from TDesktop's experimental settings.
